name: RE-NO ～STAYIN’ ALIVE～
summary: Ryou is a private detective. His girlfriend works in a music industry and requests that he escorted singer girls. A chain of incidents happens one by one with many of them of uncomprehendable nature. Ryou needs to get to the truth behind them.
info:
• 平台: WIN
  • 平台: PC-98
  • 游戏引擎: 近未来謎解き探侦ADV
  • 发行日期: 1996-06-14(PC-98) 1997-06-14(WIN)
  • 官方网站: http://web.archive.org/web/20130531015403/http://parsley.ume.gr.jp/
